docs.case_summary: You cannot start a deployment again if HPA is enabled and its set to 0 via the UI
docs.case_description:
What are you experiencing? What are you expecting to happen?
Because the up arrows are disabled when HPA(Screenshot1) is set for a deployment or deploymentconfig. There is no way to increase the replica count from 0 to x. 

And because the HPA won't scale a deployment or DC if the replica count is 0(screenshot-2), it means there's no way to start the deployment/dc again via the UI. 

You need to do it via the commandline, e.g.  kubectl scale deployment -n my-test1 --replicas 3 

Define the value or impact to you or the business
Usability
